SourceNotes: As noted by Olivieri, "Note sulla tradizione sinodale," n. 26: The statutes attributed to Gerardo at pp. 32-33 of the Salsotto edition are in fact those issued by Goffredo card. S. Marco for Lodi in 1229.
GeneralNotes: These are interspersed with additions by Bp SIgebaldo (r. 1249-68)
Edition: Salsotto, Per la storia della chiesa novarese, pp28-32
